bug.author: sbentl02
bug.summary: Settings.json not changing SimMode in Unity
bug.description: I am trying to set the SimMode in the settings.json file in Unity. When I run in Unity, there are no errors but no matter what I set SimMode to, it always starts at the selection mode. I have checked that deleting the file produces errors, so it is acknowledging the settings.json file, but doesn't seem to read anything from it.

comments.comment: Closed due to age and incompleteness (include setting.json). Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following (as requested when opening a bug issue) *Make sure to write all reproduction steps *Include full error message in text form *Search issues for error message before filing issue *Attach screenshot if applicable *Include code to run if applicable Thanks!
